events.title: Health Awareness Campaign
events.description: Join us to spread awareness about medication safety and healthy living. Guest speakers will share insights into responsible medication use, and interactive booths will help you discover how pharmacists promote health in the community.

events.title: Community Outreach Clinic
events.description: Club members volunteer at a local clinic to provide free blood‑pressure screenings and medication counseling for underserved residents. This event offers hands‑on experience and strengthens our connection with the community.

events.title: Research Showcase
events.description: Discover cutting‑edge pharmacy research conducted by students and faculty. Poster presentations and talks will cover topics from new drug formulations to innovations in patient care.
